page.title: 17STATISTICS-WEST BERGHOLT
page.content:
WE ASKED 100 PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN WEST BERGHOLT A NUMBER OF QUESTIONS.WE WORKED OUT RESULTS AS PERCENTAGES AND COMPARED THEM TO RESULTS TAKEN FROM THE 1983 NATIONAL CENSUS.ALL THOSE QUESTIONED WERE OVER 16 YEARS OF AGE. NATIONAL AVERAGES IN WHITE,LOCAL ONES IN BLUE.
NATIONAL NEWSPAPERS MALE FEMALE SUN 32{16} 26{16 DAILY MIRROR 26{16 }21{ 8} DAILY EXPRESS 14{32 }11{ 3 DAILY MAIL 13{ 8 }11{16 DAILY STAR 13 {0 }9 {4 DAILY TELEGRAPH 8{40 }7 {4 GUARDIAN 4{16 } 3{ 4 TIMES 3{32 }2 {0 FINANCIAL TIMES 3 {8 } 1{ 0
(PERCENTAGE WHO READ PAPERS REGULARLY)
